desc: The King Oak is a local, family owned business that is a one of a kind retail concept that focuses on the customer experience! We pride ourselves on bringing the model “retailtainment” to life in the Midlands. We have a superb Gift, Interiors and Lighting Store, Bistro/Coffee Shop with enclosed outdoor dining area.

layout.text: Shop Our wonderful selection of mirrors
